answers.answer: Your glucose test to check your sugar level I had one at 10 weeks and my last one at 26 weeks
And it is to test you for gestational diabetes.
Most doctors have you take the glucose test at 24-28 weeks. It's to test you for gestational diabetes. I had the orange flavor and it did just take like flat fanta.

question: I want to know what is this stuff you drink at a certain time n pregnancy people say it taste like a ole sprite??
title: Some Stuff you Drink at a certain time n pregnancy!
